tha-ap258:0.3_0: he gave gifts to the senior monks,
tha-ap258:2.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
tha-ap258:3.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
tha-ap258:4.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Kappāyana.
tha-ap258:5.1_0: sixth part of the senior monks who once was drunk.
